page.title: 13CAR JUMP RECORD
page.content: Tony Lawrence from Abbots Langley made a bid to break the world record by car jumping. He wanted to beat the old record that covered 232 feet, held by an American, Jackie Decreed. He wanted to cover a distance more than 235 feet. He was going to jump with his car, Captain Havoc, which was a Jaguar XJ12. After 5 pm on Monday 26th August 1985 he made a leap and landed in the row of cars. An ambulance rushed to the scene but he was not hurt. Afterwards he took himself to the hospital with nothing but a couple of bruises. Jackie Decreed herself was watching.
